trans-unit.source: Represents a base class for key identifier clauses that are based upon binary data.
trans-unit.target: 表示基于二进制数据的密钥标识符子句的基类。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the BinaryKeyIdentifierClause does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，BinaryKeyIdentifierClause 不需要时要使用，而不创建自定义安全令牌服务。

trans-unit.source: When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 当安全令牌服务返回安全令牌时，已颁发的安全令牌将包含对附加的和未附加安全令牌的引用。

trans-unit.source: Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references are security tokens that are not included within the security header of the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 附加的引用指包含在 SOAP 消息的安全标头的安全令牌而未附加的引用是未包含在 SOAP 消息的安全标头的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token.
trans-unit.target: 这些引用通常确认已颁发的安全令牌的真实性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified key identifier clause type, binary data and a value that indicates whether the binary data must be cloned.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>类使用指定的密钥标识符子句类型、 二进制数据和值，该值指示是否必须克隆二进制数据。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause type.
trans-unit.target: 密钥标识符子句类型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType*> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType*>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType*>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the binary data that represents the key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Byte>，其中包含表示密钥标识符的二进制数据。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to clone the array passed into the `identificationData` parameter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要克隆传入数组`identificationData`参数; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: identificationData is .
trans-unit.target: identificationDatais .

trans-unit.source: identificationData is zero length.
trans-unit.target: identificationData长度为零。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified key identifier clause type, binary data, a value that indicates whether the binary data must be cloned, a nonce and the key length.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>类使用指定的密钥标识符子句类型、 二进制数据、 一个值，该值指示是否必须克隆二进制数据、 一个 nonce 和密钥长度。

trans-unit.source: When the `derivationNonce` and `derivationLength` parameters are specified, the implied derived key is used instead of the direct security key of the token.
trans-unit.target: 当`derivationNonce`和`derivationLength`指定参数，而不是令牌的直接安全密钥使用隐含的派生的密钥。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value passed into the `cloneBuffer` parameter, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause.GetBuffer%2A> method always returns a clone of the array passed into the `identificationData` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 无论传入值`cloneBuffer`参数，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause.GetBuffer%2A>方法总是返回传入的数组的克隆`identificationData`参数。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause.GetBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause type.
trans-unit.target: 密钥标识符子句类型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType*> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType*>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType*>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the binary data that represents the key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Byte>，其中包含表示密钥标识符的二进制数据。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Sets the binary data that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause.GetBuffer*> method.
trans-unit.target: 将通过返回的二进制数据设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause.GetBuffer*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause.GetBuffer*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to clone the array passed into the `identificationData` parameter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要克隆传入数组`identificationData`参数; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the nonce that was used to create a derived key.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Byte>，包含用于创建派生的密钥的 nonce。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Sets the value that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce*> method.
trans-unit.target: 设置返回的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce*>

trans-unit.source: The size of the derived key.
trans-unit.target: 派生密钥的大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength*> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength*>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength*>

trans-unit.source: identificationData is .
trans-unit.target: identificationDatais .

trans-unit.source: identificationData is zero length.
trans-unit.target: identificationData长度为零。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binary data that represents the key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示密钥标识符的二进制数据。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value passed into the constructor's `cloneBuffer` parameter, the GetBuffer method always returns a clone of the array passed into the constructor's `identificationData` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 无论值传递到构造函数的`cloneBuffer`参数，GetBuffer 方法始终返回传递到构造函数的数组的克隆`identificationData`参数。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the binary data that represents the key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Byte>，其中包含表示密钥标识符的二进制数据。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Gets the binary data that represents the key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示密钥标识符的二进制数据。

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the GetRawBuffer method is a clone of the constructor's `identificationData` parameter when the value passed into the `cloneBuffer` is `true`; otherwise it is same array.
trans-unit.target: GetRawBuffer 方法返回的数组是构造函数的克隆`identificationData`参数值传递到时对`cloneBuffer`是`true`; 否则为原数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause.GetBuffer%2A> method always returns a clone of the array passed into the constructor's `identificationData` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause.GetBuffer%2A>方法始终返回传递到构造函数的数组的克隆`identificationData`参数。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause.GetBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the binary data that represents the key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Byte>，其中包含表示密钥标识符的二进制数据。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the binary data for the current instance matches the specified binary data.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前实例的二进制数据是否与指定的二进制数据相匹配。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> to compare to.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Byte>要进行比较。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: if data is equivalent to the binary data returned by the method; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 data 相当于返回的二进制数据方法; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例的密钥标识符是否等效于指定的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to compare to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref>要进行比较。

trans-unit.source: if keyIdentifierClause is of type and the binary data returned by the method is identical for the keyIdentifierClause parameter and the current instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 keyIdentifierClause 属于类型和返回的二进制数据方法是相同的 keyIdentifierClause 参数和当前实例; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the binary data for the current instance is equivalent to the specified binary data at the specified offset.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前实例的二进制数据是否等效于指定的偏移量处指定的二进制数据。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> to compare to.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Byte>要进行比较。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The index in the array at which the comparison starts.
trans-unit.target: 比较开始的数组中的索引。

trans-unit.source: if the binary data in the data parameter starting at the index specified in the offset parameter is equivalent to the binary data returned by the method (starting at index zero); otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果中的二进制数据 data 参数中指定索引处开始 offset 参数相当于返回的二进制数据方法 （从索引零开始）; 否则为 。
